name: wp-json-schemas
description: JSON schemas for WordPress PHP objects and REST API responses
author: John Blackbourn

scripts.version: cd packages/wp-types && npm version $(node -p -e "require('../../package.json').version") && git add .
scripts.build-wp-types: json2ts -i schema.json -o packages/wp-types/index.ts --style.trailingComma=all --style.useTabs && cat packages/wp-types/append.ts >> packages/wp-types/index.ts
